channel.title: Cant play on this MoparCraft?
channel.description: I need help, when i connect to this server, i guess i spawn at the designated spawn location, but it wont let me move, it pulls me back to spawn and i don't know why.... any help? oh when i try to type it says you must be logged in to server, but i don't know how to login to this server.....

item.title: Cant play on this MoparCraft?
item.dc:creator: @demno demno
item.description:
@demno wrote:

Thanks, i forgot about that -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Cant play on this MoparCraft?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Press t and then type /login password

password being the password you use to login the forums.

Make sure you have your username for MineCraft registered in your profile on the forums too.

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,492512.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Cant play on this MoparCraft?
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

You need to place your MineCraft name in the ‘MineCraft Name’ field in your forum profile.

Then, after you saved that, you need to login to the server and type “/login forumpassword”

Read full topic
